review: I love it and am still learning all the things I can do with it..I wish I could mirror the videos to my other rooms but have not figured it out yet or even if it is possible..Even if I cannot do that it is still worth the money..

review: We bought the fire and loved it! Bought this for our other tv. Still good with great features, but not as good as the fire tv box, it's a bit slower. Easy to install, still with the cash.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Okay: we had to study hard to hook this up! Until about a year ago we didn't even know what a streaming device was.  This was the bomb to add on to our Sony HD TV: easy, even for us.  Now we just have to rent something or pick something to watch.  We are on Prime, but we are still thinking we might have to join Netflix for some of the series we want to watch.  The "stick" itself is marvelous.  Jury still out on how much we'll use it.
author: angelamarie

review: Perfect.  Love it.  Easy to use and navigate.  Only wish the remote was a little bit bigger.  It's so easy to misplace. The remote is easy to use though.  Great product.
